settings.author: Author
settings.title: Application Settings
settings.quality_changed: Audio quality has changed. Please restart the playback.
settings.bg_notice: All background images were found on the Internet. Do you know the author? {link}

about.send_enquires: Please send any enquiries you may have to {link}.
about.title: About
about.welcome: Welcome to 24/7 online vaporwave and future funk radio station.
about.submission_form: Want to submit music for broadcast? Please use {link}.

credits.title: Credits
credits.created_by: {app} website and apps created and maintained by {author}.
credits.content_by: {content} belong to the authors. Musical content has been provided by authors and music labels. If you have any copyright issue, please let us know.

disconnected.title: Connection lost
disconnected.connection_lost: We have lost connection to our servers...
disconnected.click_button: Please click the button below to reconnect.

delete_account.if_you_want: If you want to delete your account please contact us on {email}
delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.will_be_deleted: You account and all associated data will be permanently deleted (favorites and like history).

mobile.description: We have the official Android and iOS applications. Please, download it and let Nightwave Plaza show you the past with the music of the future.

settings_language.title: Language Selection
settings_language.help: Do you want to help translate Nightwave Plaza? {link}

support.thanks: Thank you for donations, they will go straight into funding the station.
support.title: Support Us
support.rewards: You can support the radio station and further updates by donating via Boosty and get special Discord rewards!

user_favorites.title: My Favorites
user_favorites.list_empty: Your list is empty. Click the {icon} button to add songs to this list.

user_login.type_username: Type a username and password to sign in to the Nightwave Plaza.
user_login.title: Sign In

user_register.please_fill: Please fill out the registration form. All fields are required.
user_register.title: Registration

user_reset.instruction: Enter your email address and click the button — an email will be sent to you with a link to reset your password.
user_reset.title: Reset password

player_timer.title: Sleep Timer
player_timer.info: Set the time for the sleep timer. The music will stop automatically.

errors.please_sign: Please sign in to your Nightwave Plaza account to use this feature.
errors.enter_user_pass: Please enter user name and password.

fields.username_alphadash: Incorrect user name. Only letters, numbers and underscores allowed.
fields.email_unique: User with this email is already registered.
fields.username_unique: User name has already been taken.

errors.invalid_user_password: User name and password do not match.
errors.reset_link_invalid: Reset password link expired or invalid.

messages.reset_success: Instructions have been sent to your email.
messages.reaction_tip: You have liked the song. Nice! Clicking the like button twice will add song to your favorites list. Give it a try!
